name: Dino Helper 6.6 beta
description:
You find yourself in a castle. You meet a dinosaur and decide to help him find his lunch money.   Explore a large castle make friends and meet cheerful people (not that mean bunny)

This game is a work in progress. And I will be constantly working on it.  I will post updates in the future. Please notify me of any errors in the game, or if you have a suggestion.
